summary: Ahri the nine tail fox from LoL, Standalone, does not require any other mods for this to work.
descriptionHtml:
Ahri the nine tail fox from League of Legend, Fully standalone. The hair uses appachiihair. She can be found in the Drunken Huntman in WhiteRun.
Still in development.

Planning to do:
- Change hair style to fit Ahri (Anyone that can do this please contact me!)
- Add in custom voice for Ahri
- Custom spell for Ahri eg.Orb Of Deception, Fox-fire, Charm and Spirit Rush.

Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35767/?] Animated Animal ears for humanoid [/url] by No user
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?] ApachiiSkyHair [/url] by Apachii
author: Lightphoenix2
